Experiment Method.Assay Method: Genetic analysis (MALDI - TOF mass spectrometry and DNA sequencing)

Material used.Material Source: Blood samples from ethnic Chinese subjects
Material used.Description: DNA was extracted from blood samples of study subjects. Mutations were screened with MALDI - TOF mass spectrometry using the Sequenom MassARRAYTM system. The variant detected on the mass spectrometry was confirmed on sequence analysis.

Readout description.Conclusion: The frequency of the heterozygous Gly2385Arg genotype was higher in PD compared to controls
Readout description.Result Description: The frequency of the heterozygous Gly2385Arg genotype was 7.3% in PD and 3.6% in controls (odds ratio = 2.1, 95% CI: 1.1 - 3.9, P = 0.014). In multivariate logistic regression, odds ratio = 2.67, 95% CI: 1.43 - 4.99, P = 0.002

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Categorical variables were analyzed with the chi - square test. Genotype frequencies were assessed for deviation from Hardy - Weinberg equilibrium (HWE) using chi - square test for deviation from HWE. For logistic regression, the disease group (PD vs. controls) was the dependent variable, and the genotype the independent factor with adjustments made for the effect of age and gender.

Material used.Material Source: Cell line (Human embryonic kidney cells HEK - 293T)
Material used.Description: Human embryonic kidney cells (HEK - 293T) were maintained at 37°C in a 95% air/5% CO2 humidified atmosphere incubator and grown on polyornithine - precoated 6 - well plate in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM) containing 10% heat - inactivated fetal bovine serum. Cells were transfected overnight with 3.0 μg of each plasmid DNA using LipofectamineTM 2000 reagent and OptiMEM culture medium.

Readout description.Conclusion: Under 0.8 mM H2O2, the Gly2385Arg variant was more toxic and associated with a higher rate of apoptosis compared to wild type
Readout description.Result Description: For 0.8 mM H2O2 exposure, the mean percentage of apoptosis, necrosis and cell death observed for the Gly2385Arg variant transfected cells compared to wild type was 8.5 ± 1.7, versus 2.9 ± 1.3, P = 0.01, 8.1 ± 2.3, versus 6.9 ± 1.0, P = 0.43, 16.6 ± 0.66, versus 9.8 ± 2.3, P = 0.007, respectively. For 0.4 mM H2O2 exposure, no significant difference was observed.

Biological replicates.Description: The mean value for three sets of experiments was taken for the analysis

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student t - test was used to analyze numerical variables

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Apoptosis detection (Annexin V - PE apoptosis Kit I and flow cytometry)

Material used.Description: For quantitation of apoptosis on H2O2 - treated wild type and variant LRRK2 gene transfected cell population, Annexin V - PE apoptosis Kit I was used. Cells were washed, resuspended in binding buffer, and Annexin V - PE and 7 - AAD were added for flow cytometry analysis.

Readout description.Conclusion: Under 0.8 mM H2O2, the Gly2385Arg variant was more toxic and associated with a higher rate of apoptosis compared to wild type
Readout description.Result Description: For 0.8 mM H2O2 exposure, the mean percentage of apoptosis, necrosis and cell death observed for the Gly2385Arg variant transfected cells compared to wild type was 8.5 ± 1.7, versus 2.9 ± 1.3, P = 0.01, 8.1 ± 2.3, versus 6.9 ± 1.0, P = 0.43, 16.6 ± 0.66, versus 9.8 ± 2.3, P = 0.007, respectively. For 0.4 mM H2O2 exposure, no significant difference was observed.

Biological replicates.Description: The mean value for three sets of experiments was taken for the analysis

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student t - test was used to analyze numerical variables

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Determination of localization for LRRK2 variant (confocal microscopy)

Material used.Description: After overnight transfection, cells on coverslips were further incubated, rinsed, fixed, and mounted onto glass slides with DAPI - containing Vectormount for examination with an LSM - 510 laser - scanning confocal microscope.

Readout description.Conclusion: The Gly2385Arg variant was primarily cytoplasmic with some aggregates, similar to wild type protein
Readout description.Result Description: Confocal microscopy revealed the localization of the Gly2385Arg variant was primarily cytoplasmic with some aggregates, similar to wild type protein
